setOCS

public void setOCS(String location)
Set the location where your octane *.ocs file is located default: sketch_folder\master.ocs -> if you call your *.ocs file "master" and store it in your sketch_folder everything is fine with default settings!

Parameters:
location - the location of your reconfigured *.ocs file

setObjFolder

Set the location where your new *.obj files are saved default: "sketch_folder\output.obj"

Parameters:
location - the location of your reconfigured *.ocs file

setOctaneObjName

public void setOctaneObjName(String name)

Parameters:

setPicName

public void setPicName(String name)
Set the names of your exported jpgs default: "render"+framecount+".jpg"

Parameters:
the - name of your renderings (without ".jpg")

pre

public void pre()
This is called before draw(). If octane is running an loop is started until octane is closed again and ready to receive the next frame.

post

public void post()
This is automatically called after draw() in the sketch. Here the rendering in octane is started.

draw

public void draw()
This is automatically called at the end of draw() in the sketch. This function finishes the *.obj export.
